data.name: txtLogo
data.value: Fate Explorer Logo

data.name: FateQuote1
data.value: One can only explore fate as it unfolds ...

data.name: FateQuote10
data.value: Fate rolls the dice ... and we play.

data.name: FateQuote11
data.value: Fate does not care about you.

data.name: FateQuote12
data.value: Even the smallest can change the course of fate.

data.name: FateQuote2
data.value: Fate is what happens to you while you're making other plans.

data.name: FateQuote3
data.value: It is written then...

data.name: FateQuote4
data.value: Amor fati

data.name: FateQuote5
data.value: Fate is not meant to be fair ... but entertaining.

data.name: FateQuote6
data.value: Fate loves the fearless.

data.name: FateQuote8
data.value: Fate isn't in the stars. It's somewhere on page 42.

data.name: FateQuote9
data.value: Your fate is sealed. Enjoy it.

data.name: msgWrongContentType
data.value: This app expects a JSON file. The given file is of type {0}.

data.value: Import botch. Source of the error: {0}

data.name: msgCharacterImportErrorUndefined
data.value: Import botch. Reason unclear.

data.name: btnUploadFile
data.value: Upload file

data.name: lblNoCharacter
data.value: No character data available

data.name: msgLoadCharacterToUse
data.value: You can import character files created by the Optolith app

data.name: lblSmartSheet
data.value: Smart character sheet

data.name: lblCharacterFocus
data.value: Focus on your character

data.name: txtSmartSheet
data.value: Fate Explorer is your smart character sheet with the intention to relieve you of many tasks. You can create characters with the tool Optolith and play with them with Fate Explorer.

data.name: txtTeaserQuestion
data.value: What do you need Fate Explorer for?

data.name: lblSmoothGamePlay
data.value: Smoother game play

data.name: lblStartFinding
data.value: Stop searching, start finding

data.name: txtSmoothGamePlay
data.value: Less googling or browsing through books to find what you need. Fate Explorer helps game masters and players makes information easily accessible.

data.name: lblRichGamePlay
data.value: Enrich your game play

data.name: lblNeedToKnow
data.value: What you need to know

data.name: txtRichGamePlay
data.value: Find relevant knowledge about the vast DSA world that supports your game play. With in-app information and references to the Ulisses Wiki you can get lots of details.

data.name: Cookie1
data.value: Please note that Fate Explorer uses cookies to store the state of app and characters.

data.name: Cookie2
data.value: That includes: the current date you set and the app settings. Also, when you re-load a character Fate Explorer may recognize it and load the last known health points and other values you may have changed.

data.name: Cookie3
data.value: Fate Explorer does no tracking or other stuff with these cookies. Their only purpose is your convenience.

data.name: Cookie4
data.value: At this moment it is not possible to use Fate Explorer without this feature. By continuing you accept the fact that data is stored on your computer.

data.name: Cookie5
data.value: Please apologize that I talk to you like a Horasian Comte but here at this point I am obliged to do so.

data.name: btnPostpone
data.value: Postpone

data.name: btnUpdate
data.value: Update now

data.name: altImgSpider
data.value: Large spider

data.name: altImgDragon
data.value: Dragon shows threatening gesture

data.name: altImgUnicorn
data.value: Rearing white unicorn

data.name: FateQuote13
data.value: Fate is a lack of knowledge ... nothing more, nothing less.

data.name: FateQuote14
data.value: Many people confuse fate and bad management.

data.name: FateQuote15
data.value: Fate visits us in three disguises: as a thief, as a whore or as seller of lottery tickets.

data.name: FateQuote16
data.value: Your birth is not your fate.

data.name: FateQuote17
data.value: Just take one step after the next and let fate decide your fate.

data.name: FateQuote18
data.value: You do not beat fate working harder. You beat fate being more imaginative.

data.name: FateQuote19
data.value: Stop mislabelling injustice as fate.

data.name: FateQuote20
data.value: Every one created the fate of every one else - no one creates their own.

data.name: FateQuote21
data.value: Fate ends once you face it.

data.name: FateQuote22
data.value: Fate is merely an excuse for stupid decisions.

data.name: FateQuote23
data.value: Some day it will all make sense.

data.name: FateQuote24
data.value: When fate smiles at you, do not think it'll make you one bit happier. Fate is a master of irony.

data.name: FateQuote25
data.value: That isn't called fate. It is called Imperavi.

data.name: FateQuote26
data.value: Fate shows you the paths you can walk. Not the paths you like.

data.name: FateQuote27
data.value: Wherever fate leads you - you do not have to stay there.

data.name: FateQuote28
data.value: Fate is finding things you have never been looking for.

data.name: FateQuote29
data.value: If you do not master your fate, someone else is going to do it.

data.name: FateQuote30
data.value: The stars are the father of fate. The soul is it's mother.

data.name: FateQuote31
data.value: Fate does not give heads-ups. It is far too twisted for that.

data.name: FateQuote32
data.value: It is fate that we earn our fate.

data.name: FateQuote33
data.value: Fate simply acts faster than we can finish our plans.

data.name: FateQuote34
data.value: If you stop making plans, fate stops spoiling them.

data.name: FateQuote35
data.value: Certainly, how man meets fate is almost more important than what his fate is.

data.name: FateQuote36
data.value: Fate cannot be healed like an illness.

data.name: FateQuote37
data.value: Fate is what life dishes out. Destiny is what you make of it.

data.name: FateQuote38
data.value: It is your own personal fate. Do not take it personal.

data.name: FateQuote39
data.value: The godly one recognises his fate in Him.
